Oregon State System of Higher Education
GENERAL EXTENSION DIVISION
Department of Educational Media
1633 Southwest Park Avenue
Portland 1, Oregon
April 21, 1961
APR 2 5 1961
Mr. Harold E. Hill /
Administrative Vice President
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington, D. C.
Dear Harold:
The governor^ despite the previous jogging your first
wire made possible, just today asked us for a reply to the
Oren Harris request. Such are the delays of government!
Enclosed is a copy of the letter as it was sent off to
Washington.
lalph Steetle
^.rector
RS/v
Enel.
